attributes.action: Allow Smoking in Secondary Schools & Collages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students in Secondary Schools or Collages should be aloud to smoke in thier Break & Lunch times, which would lower the amount of "Illegal" students outside of the school. If teachers acting as Loco-Parent's during school time knew of the location of thier students, then they could supervise or set up smoking zones in which students could smoke wihtout being in danger.
